title: Topic 001 Question 089
body: An AWS account includes two S3 buckets: bucket1 and bucket2. The bucket2 does not have a policy defined, but bucket1 has the following bucket policy:
/Amazon AWS Certified Security - Specialty Exam Practice Questions/img/0005500001.png
In addition, the same account has an IAM User named `alice`, with the following IAM policy.
/Amazon AWS Certified Security - Specialty Exam Practice Questions/img/0005500002.png
